comment._content: I wonder if this was the occasion - SMH 3/8/1927 - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/16394391 ?

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
Aha!  Thinking laterally, that looks like Wharf 2 Walsh Bay on the right, with Pier One behind.  
But what could that HUGE crane behind possibly be building at Dawes Point in possibly 1927 ?
Answer - the Harbour Bridge !!

Q. E. D.  ?
